vendor_name: The Westin Punta Cana Resort & Club
title: Five Star Beachfront Caribbean Escape - Kids Stay Free!
description: The Caribbean’s swaying palm trees, white-sand beaches and crystal-clear ocean are waiting for you at The Westin Puntacana Resort & Club in the Dominican Republic. Perfect for a romantic or family escape, stay in five-star beachfront luxury with daily breakfast, an exotic dining experience and golf and spa discounts included. Plus, two kids stay free!
offer_address: Playa Blanca at Puntacana Resort & Club, Punta Cana 23300, Dominican Republic

title: Five-Star Dominican Republic Escape Designed by Oscar de la Renta
description:
Celebrate stylish Caribbean living where nature takes centre stage at Tortuga Bay Puntacana Resort & Club - a stylish 1,500-acre resort set on the natural surroundings and richness of Tortuga Bay in the Dominican Republic. Ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor, this luxury resort is the ultimate destination for exquisite seclusion, understated elegance, and unparalleled personal service.

Perfectly positioned in a private enclave within the resort, Tortuga Bay is comprised of extravagant villas offering Dominican character and contemporary touches with plantation-style suite interiors designed by fashion designer Oscar de la Renta. Beautiful as these beachside accommodations are, there are an array of five-star amenities to be tempted by, including 45-holes of championship golf, several tennis courts, multiple swimming pools, an indulgent spa and an on-site equestrian centre. As well as award-winning restaurants run by world-class chefs and a diverse selection of stylish bars and clubs, there is something for every person, palate, mood, and occasion.
location_description: Tortuga Bay Hotel Puntacana Resort & Club
offer_address: Punta Cana Resort & Golf Club, Higüey 23000, Dominican Republic
